channel.title: k8s on Tweakzx
channel.description: Recent content in k8s on Tweakzx

item.title: Ubuntu安装k8s集群
item.description: 在ubuntu上k8s集群部署实践 一、机器配置 配置主机名 sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "k8s-master" // Run this command on masternode cat /etc/hostname sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "k8s-node1" // Run this command on node-0 sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "k8s-node2" // Run this command on node-1 配置/etc/hos
